Name: Songmu
Village_Settlement: Songmu is part of the Zhukeng Administrative Village 珠坑行政村. The population of Songmu is approximately 600 people.
Surname_Groups: Surnames include the Wu 吴, the Xin 辛, the Zhang 张, the Chen陈, the Huang 黄, and the Liu 刘.
Village_Temples: 1) Dongyuanjing Yongangong 东园境永安宫, Zhukengshê 珠坑社: The main gods are Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王, Houtu Zhukeng sevenfold ritual alliance furen 后土夫人, and Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝. Secondary gods include Xuantan yuanshuai 玄坛元帅 and Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君. 2) Wanshantang 万善堂: The main gods are Chen dage 陈大哥 and Xu daren 徐大人. Secondary gods include Zhang erye 张二爷, Zhu sanye 朱三爷, and Wu guniang 吴姑娘. 3) Dongyuantang 东园堂 is dedicated to Lin Lonjiang 林龙江. The SJCDCB, 1992:20 claims that there are 22 initiates.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/17 all the gods of Yongangong 永安宫 are invited to go on procession within the village. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/3: The birthday celebration of Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis. 10/25: The birthday celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
